title: Emerald & Diamond Nakshi Inspired "Addigai" Necklace
materials: GH clarity). Hyderabadi Polish for a luxurious finish.
features: A modern interpretation of the traditional Addigai. Features a choker-style neckpiece transitioning into a floral motif pendant design adorned with emeralds and polki diamonds. Intricate filigree work surrounds the emeralds, highlighting their brilliance. The necklace is embellished with gold bead tassels, adding a touch of traditional charm. Features a unique textured gold band with diamond accents.
colors: Primarily Gold with vibrant Green Emeralds and sparkling White (Polki) Diamonds.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suited for contemporary events where you want to make a sophisticated statement. Perfect for Seemantham (సీమంతం) or any auspicious ceremony.
description: This Addigai necklace seamlessly blends traditional South Indian craftsmanship with contemporary aesthetics. The use of high-quality emeralds and polki diamonds ensures a dazzling display of luxury. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, enduring luster, making it a cherished heirloom piece. The design is not only aesthetically pleasing but also culturally significant, reflecting the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry.
